aboutMe: Experienced Frontend Developer with 3.5 years in building high-performance web apps using JavaScript and React. Skilled in writing clean, scalable code and responsive UIs, with familiarity in Python and backend integration. Focused on seamless user experiences and code quality in fast-paced environments.

responsibilities: Built E-commerce and POS modules with React.js and state management tools.
Worked on custom pharmacy POS systems with loyalty programs and dynamic interfaces.
Collaborated with backend team for REST API integration.
Owned end-to-end frontend development for multiple projects, delivering scalable UIs.
Developed Bookeve Main & Tenant Web applications with scheduling, booking, and secure payments.
Enhanced UI performance and optimized API integrations.

projects.description: Customizable POS with theme-based UI, lot tracking, loyalty programs, expiry tracking, and prescription handling.
